org.microtitan.diffusive.classloaders.factories

Class RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.microtitan.diffusive.classloaders.factories.RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClassLoaderFactory

    public class RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClassLoaderFactory
    Factory for creating RestfulDiffuserClassLoader objects. Use the set(...) methods to set the parameters that the factory will use to create the RestfulDiffuserClassLoader object.
    Author:
    Robert Philipp

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory

        private RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory()
        Default no-arg constructor. Sets a few default values for the DiffusiveTranslator, the ExprEditor, the parent class loader, and the class pool.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static RestfulDiffuserClassLoaderFactory getInstance()
        Returns:
        the ClassLoaderFactoryRepository instance (lazy instantiation)

      • set

        public void set(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> configClasses,
       java.util.List<java.lang.String> delegationPrefixes,
       javassist.ClassPool pool)
        Sets the specified parameters. None of the parameter objects should be null, and none of the lists should be empty.
        Parameters:
        configClasses - A List containing the names of configuration classes that are used for configuration. Because these need to be loaded by this class loader, they must all be static methods (i.e. the class shouldn't have already been loaded) and they must be annotated with the @DiffusiveConfiguration annotation. Associated with each configuration class is an {@link Object}[] containing any arguments the configuration method may need.
        delegationPrefixes - The list of prefixes to the fully qualified class name. Classes whose fully qualified class names start with one of these prefixes are loaded by the parent class loader instead of this one.
        parentLoader - the parent class loader of this class loader
        classPool - the source of the class files

      • set

        public void set(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> configClasses,
       javassist.ClassPool pool)
        Sets the specified parameters. None of the parameter objects should be null, and none of the lists should be empty.
        Parameters:
        configClasses - A List containing the names of configuration classes that are used for configuration. Because these need to be loaded by this class loader, they must all be static methods (i.e. the class shouldn't have already been loaded) and they must be annotated with the @DiffusiveConfiguration annotation. Associated with each configuration class is an {@link Object}[] containing any arguments the configuration method may need.
        classPool - the source of the class files

      • createDefaultTranslator

        private static DiffusiveTranslator createDefaultTranslator(MethodIntercepterEditor expressionEditor)
        Creates the default translator for Javassist to replace method calls from diffused methods
        Parameters:
        expressionEditor - The expression editor containing the code that replaces the method call
        Returns:
        A new translator for rewriting method calls to diffused methods

      • createDefaultMethodIntercepter

        private static MethodIntercepterEditor createDefaultMethodIntercepter(java.lang.String signature)
        Creates a default method intercepter using the specified Diffuser
        Parameters:
        signature - The base signature of the associated diffuser. Method calls with this signature won't be diffused further.
        Returns:
        creates and returns a MethodIntercepterEditor with a local Diffuser

      • create

        public RestfulDiffuserClassLoader create(java.lang.ClassLoader parentLoader,
                                java.lang.String signature,
                                java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
        Description copied from interface: ClassLoaderFactory
        Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network
        Specified by:
        create in interface ClassLoaderFactory
        Parameters:
        parentLoader - The parent class loader
        signature - The signature of the base method that shouldn't be diffused further
        classPaths - The list of URI specifying the web service end-point for retrieving serialized Class objects
        Returns:
        The ClassLoader for loading classes over the network

      • create

        public RestfulDiffuserClassLoader create(java.lang.String signature,
                                java.util.List<java.net.URI> classPaths)
        Description copied from interface: ClassLoaderFactory
        Creates a ClassLoader for loading classes over the network. Should default the parent class loader to the loader that loads this class.
        Specified by:
        create in interface ClassLoaderFactory
        Parameters:
        signature - The signature of the base method that shouldn't be diffused further
        classPaths - The list of URI specifying the web service end-point for retrieving serialized Class objects
        Returns:
        The ClassLoader for loading classes over the network
